quotiteCessibleZarasoa.title: Quotité Cessible ZARASOA (33.33% du Net après Endettement)
Quotité Cessible ZARASOA (33.33% du Net après Endettement)
Quotité Cessible ZARASOA (33.33% du Net après Endettement)

scripts:
//Informations Pret 
 const listErrors=[];function isEmpty(value){return(value==null||value===""||(Array.isArray(value)&&value.length===0))}let requiredFields=["groupeProduit","produit","montantMin","montantMax","duree","objetDuCredit","tauxInteretAnnuel","tauxMin","tauxMax","negociable","cinNumerisee","certificatResidenceDemandeur","devisProforma","photocopieCarnetFokontany"];requiredFields.forEach((field)=>{if(isEmpty(data[field])){listErrors.push(utils.error(field,`Le champ '${field.replace(/([A-Z])/g," $1").toLowerCase()}' est obligatoire.`))}});const isProspect=Array.isArray(data.prospect)&&data.prospect.includes("Oui");if(isProspect){let nonClient=data["nonClient"]||{};if(data.segment==="Personne Morale"){const requiredForPersonneMorale=["fluxTresorerie","capaciteRemboursementDscr","chiffreAffaires","dateEntreeEnRelation","anciennete","creditsEnCours","creditsContractes","incidentsPaiement","realisation"];requiredForPersonneMorale.forEach((field)=>{if(isEmpty(nonClient[field])){listErrors.push(utils.error(`nonClient.${field}`,`Ce champ est obligatoire.`))}})}if(data.segment==="Personne Physique"){const requiredForPersonnePhysique=["salaireNetHorsIndemniteVariable","quotiteCessibleLegal","dateEntreeEnRelation","anciennete","endettementEnCoursLieSalaire","prelevementFixe","netApresEndettement","quotiteCessibleZarasoa","incidentsPaiement","realisation"];requiredForPersonnePhysique.forEach((field)=>{if(isEmpty(nonClient[field])){listErrors.push(utils.error(`nonClient.${field}`,`Ce champ est obligatoire.`))}})}}else{let client=data["client"]||{};if(data.segment==="Personne Morale"){const requiredForPersonneMorale=["fluxTresorerie","capaciteRemboursementDscr","chiffreAffaires","dateEntreeEnRelation","anciennete","creditsEnCours","creditsContractes","incidentsPaiement","realisation"];requiredForPersonneMorale.forEach((field)=>{if(isEmpty(client[field])){listErrors.push(utils.error(`client.${field}`,`Ce champ est obligatoire.`))}})}if(data.segment==="Personne Physique"){const requiredForPersonnePhysique=["salaireNetHorsIndemniteVariable","quotiteCessibleLegal","dateEntreeEnRelation","anciennete","endettementEnCoursLieSalaire","prelevementFixe","netApresEndettement","quotiteCessibleZarasoa","incidentsPaiement","realisation"];requiredForPersonnePhysique.forEach((field)=>{if(isEmpty(client[field])){listErrors.push(utils.error(`client.${field}`,`Ce champ est obligatoire.`))}})}}return listErrors;
